main event: A cylindrical object about 50 feet off the ground appeared and was observed by officers from the Seventh Army Staff at Fort Knox, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object had very bright lights and was traveling in a very slow, erratic course.
The object was initially observed at approximately 45 degrees above the celestial horizon.
The object abruptly began to descend in a spiral fashion, with a light beam of about 25 degrees elevation shining from an attached towing bar.
The object was trailing sparks as it descended.
A sharp, combat-like sound was heard during the sighting.
sighted object: a cylindrical object with very bright lights
witnesses: officers from the Seventh Army Staff
